'''''Minecraft: Super Bite-Sized Builds''''' is a building tutorial book containing 21 small-scale builds.

== Synopsis ==
{{Quote|It's time for another bite-size adventure! Build over 20 new mini-projects in Minecraft, from pig hot-air balloons and carousels to monster-truck school buses and skull coves. There's even a giant grandfather clock that dispenses chickens! <br><br> With illustrated step-by-step instructions and tips throughout, this book will have you creating loads of fun builds to impress your friends with!}}
